title: "Using machine learning to narrow down the possibilities for a better quantum tunneling interface"
excerpt: "A pair of researchers at Fudan University in China has used machine learning to narrow the list of possible improved tunneling interface configurations for use in transistors. They have published their results in Physical Review Letters."
